Post-Match Reflections: France were disappointing and are disappointed. Mbappé sad rather than angry, perhaps there wasn’t so much in that late penalty shout after all.

Ben Fisher was at the BVB Stadion Dortmund this afternoon, and his verdict has landed. Here it is! Congratulations/commiserations to France, just commiserations to Poland, and thanks for reading this MBM.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Robert Lewandowski celebrates after scoring a re-taken penalty.
Skorupski has been Poland’s man of the match so far.
Maignan had come fractionally off his line, and Lewandowski is gifted a second chance!
Upamecano was forced to head behind under serious pressure.
